The only reason I bought this one was bc an old roommate had a kettle that looked like it, but was actually very fast, and I mistakenly believed it to be the same one.

Just recently broke my old kettle and found this new one. Great for a present. Love the quality and the print. Sort of a little heavy when kettle is completely full. This kettle is different tho because it is ceramic, doesn't give a metal taste to your water and works fast. Easy to clean and the handle doesn't get hot, the lid has a silicone ring so it stays in place. Highly recommend this kettle.
This item is beautiful just as it looks. It steams perfectly and the selections are one of a kind. I do not regret purchasing this item. It beats any other I have purchased in the past.

This kettle works great. Looks nice too. I would only change one thing, it’s large. My 11 year old son sometimes likes to us it for tea or noodles and he has a really hard time lifting it and pooring even when kettle is not full. I also have a hard time.

I really love this kettle. I've been using it for about a month. The only reason I gave it 3 stars for ease of use is because it's a bit heavy. So I would not recommend it for someone who would have issues lifting a full kettle with one hand. Also you do need to keep your hand on the upper part of the handle as the lower part gets a bit too hot.

It is so handy to have it on the counter and quickly get hot water for tea or hot chocolate....both of which we use often. It is attractive and very helpful. I didn't rate durability because I haven't had it long enough to fairly evaluate that.

this gorgeous kettle is so beautiful! fits my kitchen perfectly! its stylish and boils water pretty fast! the only one thig i wish it was little ligter..its very heavy but i guess its because of its material what its made of..otherwise i love it

This ceramic tea kettle has a great style (with easy to pour spout) that doesn't take up a lot of counter space. The lid is not as hard to take off and put on as some tea kettles that I have previously purchased (which includes a different Bella tea kettle). I have had no problem so far with the heating element.

LOVE it! It's gorgeous and well-made. Other reviewers commented on a plastic smell, but I haven't noticed anything unusual in the smell or taste of the water. It heats up super fast, and automatically shuts off after a couple of minutes (which is great for me because I often forget to unplug). The water stays hot for quite some time, but I drink my tea iced anyway. The cord is long and tucks in nicely for storage.

I was hesitant to purchase because of mixed reviews, but I can honestly say that there is nothing I don’t love about this tea kettle. I purchased the 1.2L size which is bigger than I thought it would be, but that’s not a bad thing. I love the elegant look. It makes me feel classy when pouring a cup of tea. I also love how the pot comes off of the base freely so I am not restricted by a cord. Overall, I recommend it.

This is a great electric kettle. It heats up water in no time and we like the design/look of it. The two downsides are that it doesn’t make a sound when the water is hot (the click of it turning off is very quiet) and the blue light that comes on when it’s heating is almost too bright to look at.

Love it! It works great and is aesthetically pleasing.
Months later and this still works perfectly. It stays super clean on the inside with none of the hard water build up I've seen in previous kettles and is extremely easy to keep clean on the outside! It still looks brand new and I use this every day! Would highly recommend!
However if you have arthritis this may be too heavy for you. That's the ONLY downside!

First one arrived without a box - in a plastic bag! A ceramic kettle in a plastic bag with barely any packaging materials. It was shattered. Second one arrived in a box, but the handle is cracked where it attaches to the base and it is not useable! Would not recommend.

reviews.reviewTitle: Heats up water super fast. I like how it looks out on ...
reviews.reviewText: Heats up water super fast. I like how it looks out on the counter and my husband finds it handy for coffee. I had wanted a Bella since we got married a few years ago, but held off because I thought it might be pointless. When Husband requested an electric kettle, I knew just what to get.

Beautiful kettle. A lot larger than I expected (but to me that's a plus). Simple with 1 button to press that lights up, which automatically turns off once water reaches temp. Heats up quick, not too noisy. LOVE the feature that lets you easily take it off its base and pour...very convenient and many electric kettles do not have this feature. Only downside with a ceramic kettle is that you have to be very careful when putting on and taking off the lid so as not to break. So far... great purchase!

This is my second Bella ceramic tea kettle, and I love them! I bought the first one through Macy's (the one with black flower clusters). I broke the lid on the last one but couldn't find a lid replacement. I decided to get this one again over cheaper options because the other one lasted so long and I love how it looks in my kitchen.🤗 I drink tea at least twice a day and this is just a pleasure to use.

BEAUTIFUL!! heats water very fast, sturdy, a little heavy but that's shows the quality. when water is filled to the MAX line it holds 30 ounces. looks great on my countertop. when water comes to a boil it turns off itself so no worries of overheating the electric element. i would buy it again for myself and i would buy it for a gift! the rubber on the inside of the top is BPA free. also, the top is very secure.

We decided to do away with a microwave and quickly learned not all hot water tastes the same when boiled, depending on the pot or kettle. I had a stove top kettle and it always left a metal taste in the water. Ordered this and can’t be happier! Plus it’s pretty!

I loved this kettle for a year, but it suddenly stopped working. I used it about once a week (I ended up mostly making coffee at work), and now suddenly it doesn't light up, doesn't heat water. It's too expensive for something that only works for one year.

I like the fact that there is no plastic in this product, we use it to boil water for hot tea, over 10 times a day. We gave the one we had for several years to our daughter so she can enjoy hot tea in her college dorm. And we had to buy another one because we can’t live without it :)

The product itself is very nice, however, I purchased it at the end of July 2019 and followed the directions carefully as to cleaning it before use. The second time I used it I noticed mineralization and followed the directions carefully how to demineralize it overnight. It went away the next day and now it is back again. I do not like the idea of having to do this every time I use it. Perhaps this unit is defective. Can I get some help as what to do?

reviews.reviewTitle: Worth the splurge.....and an added bonus!
reviews.reviewText:
Enough with all the ugly hot pots!

I drink a lot of tea so a hot pot is a nice luxury. We have found other uses for quick hot water too: heating up baby bottles, steaming vegetables, french press coffee, speeding up the pasta cooking process. When I was looking around I didn't want another metal eyesore in our kitchen. This goes perfectly with the feel of our kitchen and heats up a (tea) pot and a half of water. So glad I sprung for this hot pot!

I've used this multiple times a day for about 6 months now and everything is going great. Its really cute and everyone who comes over comments how they love the design. It heats up water quickly and shuts itself off after it starts to boil. I love that it is ceramic and not plastic as well, and is super easy to clean. Would buy again.

This is perfect for making coffee in the morning. It’s probably my favorite electric kettle. It’s sturdy, well built and stylish. I recently got one from Walmart and let me say that this is far superior!

We loved this at first, but after just 6 months the on/off switch died.
Also, next electric I get won't be as heavy. It is a good idea to have something like this
if you are likely to forget your heating/burning kettle on the stove!
Bought this product ahead of time as a gift. The pot has cracked all the way through it making useless. If ordering as a gift check it when it arrives before gifting.
Such Chic and sleep looking kettle, makes serving my tea so pretty. I've seen reviews about it spilling water, I've had it for a bit and no problems yet.

This was listed as a new item, but was obviously pre-owned. It had hard water marks on the inside bottom of the kettle and the box had been cut open and re-taped. That by itself is very frustrating.
As for the actual kettle, it's pretty. It has been used about a dozen times in 3 days and it seems to do the job well and fairly quickly. Easy for teens to use. The ceramic does get very hot to the touch, but the handle stays cool.

I really wanted a ceramic kettle after reading many reviews. Much quicker heating than expected, easy to use with detachable base, cute pattern, perfect size! No weird taste like some electric kettles leave behind.

I love this tea pot. It heats up fast, is easy to clean and the color is beautiful! I leave it out on my counter since it’s so pretty and use it daily for everything from tea, to hot water for warming baby bottles. So many uses!

Love this! Great alternative to the tea kettle on the stove. Water heats up quickly. No weird tastes. It is a little loud when heating up, but its for such a short time that it doesn't matter. Love the blue light on the switch and that it turns off automatically when ready.
Love the look. Keep on my desk, at work, and get a ton of compliments! Helps me to drink enough water as well as I love hot water while sitting in a cold office.

reviews.reviewTitle: Do NOT buy if you want HOT WATER. It is NOT worth it!!!!
reviews.reviewText: Do NOT buy IF you want HOT WATER. It looks elegant, but even that will also depend on your kitchen layout and design. I have a small kitchen with brown cabinets and dark appliances so did not look as elegant in my kitchen as it might in others. So keep that in mind. But if you need hot water this is NOT the kettle to purchase. It is AWFUL. I have used this 5 times so far and the water does NOT get hot enough. It is horrible. Worst purchase I ever made. STAY away from this kettle. Try others IF you want hot water. Buy it for the looks but NOT for the functionality.
One of the Best Buy’s On amazing for price and beauty and just doing what it’s supposed to do. Boil water super fast
Loved this kettle at first but I’ve only had it since February and the handle is now coming off!!
It is exactly what I wanted but its heavy... and I just hate the lid... It hart to close (because of the rubber around) and to open, It be perfect if this problem would be fix...

I love how charming this teapot looks in my kitchen. It boils water quickly and the water also stays warm in the kettle for quite some time. Others have complained about a weird taste to the water -- I notice that if I do not change the water daily, it does have an unpleasant chemical taste -- may be the teapot, may be my water. My solution is to load it freshly each day. Mine arrived with the rubber seal to the lid broken but I will contact the manufacturer directly to replace that part.

I love the look and feel of this pot. It’s absolutely beautiful in my kitchen. A lot
Of people notice it and comment on it. It works great. Quiet and quick.

reviews.reviewTitle: No silicone ring around lid to prevent leakage at the lid
reviews.reviewText: There was no silicone ring around the base of the lid. If the kettle is full, boiling water spills out of the unsecured lid when you tip the kettle over. This was very disappointing.
Not only beautiful addition to my countertop in kitchen, looks like art sitting while not in use. Reliable brand

reviews.reviewTitle: Brilliant! And look great with my water filter!
reviews.reviewText: I love my Bella! Very sturdy and well made! Boiled water perfectly. I boil water a lot for my teas and sometimes for cooking! Great idea for ceramic and snugged sealed top!

reviews.reviewTitle: Beautiful, heats fast, and makes tea for the whole family!
reviews.reviewText: This kettle is great! We are using it every day, it’s beautiful and it heats the water up fast, also holds a lot of water so great for a family of heavy tea drinkers!
We make tea and coffee everyday and like using this ceramic water pot to heat water. Like it some much better than ones with plastic or all metal.

reviews.reviewTitle: ... a little bit of money and it came in perfect condition! No scratches or anything
reviews.reviewText: I bought this used to save a little bit of money and it came in perfect condition! No scratches or anything! My boyfriend and I love this kettle and both agree that it's made really well! It is a little heavy when lifting it up, but you can tell that's because the quality is so darn good!

I have been using this kettle multiple times a day for 2 1/2 years. It still works like the day I got it, and boils water very quickly. I got it open box as a warehouse deal, and I'm happy I did. I really love that there is no plastic.

reviews.reviewTitle: Developed a hairline crack all the way around within six months. Can no longer use
reviews.reviewText: I did a lot of research before I bought this and decided that ceramic made the most sense for me. It is very pretty on the counter and, while heavy, you know what you’re getting with ceramic. However, I came down the other morning to find a puddle on my counter. A hairline crack developed all the way around the bottom third of the kettle. Water now drips out slowly and I can no longer use this. Very disappointing.

Not only is it functional, but it is super cute! I bought it for the office, and so many people have commented on it. I like that the cord wraps around the base. It's the perfect thing for hot tea, pour overs, or French press coffee. {Picture shows it with my coffee setup at work. I love it!}

reviews.reviewTitle: Broke after a year and month
reviews.reviewText: This pretty expensive teakettle served a little more than a year. I purchased it on Nov 22, 2017. It doesn't turn on today, Dec 19,2018. I really loved design, but expected it to serve at least 3 years. I wish manufacturer covered this kind of problems

reviews.reviewTitle: Great electric kettle. Would definitely buy again.
reviews.reviewText: This electric tea kettle was larger than I anticipated, but it's been a terrific purchase. I've used it consistently since I bought it more than a year ago, and it's still going strong. I love the look (even down to the color of the light when the kettle's switched on) and I would definitely buy this again — especially if you keep your kettle on your countertop.
I am love with this electric jar n my husband was happy with my choice too ❤️❤️

Bella is a beautiful addition to our kitchen. I kind of wish it was lighter, but then it might be less sturdy. It boils water in about a minute and keeps it hot for a fair amount of time. I love that i can take it to the table without a cord getting in the way, and that the bottom is cool to the touch.
I love how it looks on my counter, love the design. The only thing I dislike is the outside gets hot but not the handle and spout so it does not make any problem.
I’ve been eyeing this tea kettle for months at Target and finally bought it here on amazon. It’s so cute, beautiful pattern. Looks great on my kitchen counter.

I just wanted a kettle to heat some water - not a lot of doodads. Something easy to clean and pretty, since it sits on my countertop.
This kettle is simply elegant, and it's incredibly easy to use and to clean. It's been in use for about a year and is almost like new. I'm very pleased with it.

I used it 1 month and it was broken. When it began to boil it was not turned off.
So disappointed because it was looks good
The product is elegant sitting on the counter. It is a bit heavy when filled. Requires two hands and be careful because it is breakable.

reviews.reviewTitle: Heats fast plus a Beautiful copper finish!
reviews.reviewText: I love how quickly it heats up water to boiling! The copper color glass presents a beautiful display on my kitchen! Outside Cleans so easy with a damp cloth and inside is equally easy to clean. I’m extremely satisfied with this product.

reviews.reviewTitle: This is a nice kettle that looks nice on the counter
reviews.reviewText: I had no issues with a chemical smell or taste, we did air out the pot for several days before using it. This is a nice kettle that looks nice on the counter, and heats a full pot in 90 seconds. Its a bit on the heavy side, especially when full but we wanted an attractive ceramic kettle and are happy with the sturdiness. We use it multiple times every day.

Beautiful ceramic teapot. The blue color is vibrant and has a smooth glaze. It has substantial weight and feels very balanced in your hand. Heats water quickly and quietly unlike a stove top teapot. I use it at work and now everyone wants tea using the hot water from my beautiful pot instead of coffee from the cruddy communal coffee pot!

reviews.reviewTitle: Why did I wait 37 years to buy this??!!
reviews.reviewText: This is a great tea kettle. This is our first electric kettle and we will never be without one again. Love the design of the astec blue. Brings water just to a boil, then shuts off. We use it for our French press, making tea, hot chocolate, etc. Heats water fast and is the perfect size for our needs.
Nice looking item that cracked after a few uses. Very dissatisfied with the item. DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY ON THIS!!!

I use this multiple times a day. It heats well and quickly, stays hot, and looks good on my countertop sinceI use it so often (I'm not a fan of things sitting on my counters). Highly recommend if you are a tea drinker.

reviews.reviewTitle: Very happy with this tea kettle
reviews.reviewText: This was given as a gift, and I have had positive feedback from the user . She "loves it1"

love this....looks so cute everyone notices it...
i used to warm up my dogs chicken on the stove every morning and night.... now i just make hot water in the kettle and pour it over the food....sooo eady and clean ... they love it and it has changed my routine....in addition, great for tea....

reviews.reviewTitle: Don’t buy!! Hard to clean and defective.
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this product in June and it already stopped working. The amazon options for returning or reporting defects have closed so now I am stuck with a defective product that will go into the garbage. Such a bummer!

reviews.reviewTitle: Looks great on the table and stays hot
reviews.reviewText: Efficient and quick to heat up water for 3-4 large cups. Has been perfect for tea, hot chocolate, etc. Also worked out great to place on table and let folks who don't like "strong" coffee add hot water to their liking.

I've been using this kettle for more than two years, and I am happy with the product. But recently the silicone gasket on the lid got broken. I contacted the company and asked if I could purchase a replacement gasket, and they just sent me a gasket free of charge. I am very pleased with their product and customer service.

I love this cattle! I had exactly the same from this company for 5 years with no problems. It is stylish, keeps the water hot for a long time and it is super easy to clean. My old one broke so I ordered a new one with no hesitation.

This kettle worked great for about 8 months, then one day as it was warming up the bottom few inches started to glow (it looked like someone stuck an orange light inside the pot). It overheated and now it won’t turn on at all. It comes with a one year warranty, but unfortunately their customer service is not responsive. It’s a shame because I loved this kettle, but now I wouldn’t recommend BELLA Housewares products to anyone.

reviews.reviewTitle: Leaks like a White House staffer
reviews.reviewText: Within 2 weeks of giving this to my wife for Mother's Day, it started leaking...a lot. When you fill it and put it on its stand it empties a g[od bit onto the counter.
Love so much that I bought one for my mom for her birthday! I use mine everyday, if anything were to happen to mine I would definitely repurchase.

reviews.reviewTitle: Stopped working in less than two months!
reviews.reviewText: Broke within two months, just stopped working won’t turn on at all! So disappointed.
I love how large and heavy this ceramic pot is. The only thing i don't like is that there is a fingerprint in blue glaze on front of pot.... still keeping it.

reviews.reviewTitle: So Adorable and Works well too!
reviews.reviewText: This is the cutest little kettle to keep out on your counter as decoration-- whether you're using it every day or not. It's incredibly sturdy and solid, and I get compliments on it all the time-- This would be the best housewarming gift, too!

It is heavy but not too heavy. Feels nice and sturdy, not fragile. I was concerned about it keeping water hot for long periods of time but I boiled water in it last night and I can say that was not an issue! It looks great sitting out on the counter. Definitely, for me, a better choice than the stainless.

Elegant and works great
Update: we’re still using this and I and my guests who use this just love it. Few of my friends actually bought similar item after seeing how convenient it is to use and how gorgeous it looks.

reviews.reviewTitle: So pretty on the counter and makes my morning tea much less time consuming.
reviews.reviewText: I've never used an electric kettle until we were on vacation and it was in our hotel room. Once I came home, I decided I wanted an electric instead of the stove top kettle I had. I am so glad that I purchased this item. It is so pretty and heats the water so quickly. Only wish I had gotten it sooner!

I absolutely love this kettle. I wanted something functional but also pretty enough to keep out all the time. This fit the bill. I’ve had it for over a year with once-twice daily use and it’s been perfect.
This was a replacement kettle. The first one cracked after years of use. It looks nice and heats fast!

I’ve had this kettle for about 3 months now, and love it! My husband and I love coffee and tea, and this thing is amazing for both! You can heat just enough for a cup or two of tea, or enough for a press pot! It’s beautiful, easy to use, and easy enough to clean. I love that the cord wraps up in the base so you can customize the length. It took convincing to get my husband to ok this purchase, a little pricey, but 100% worth it! He told me last night how glad he is to have it!

reviews.reviewTitle: Two cracked kettles in less than 6 months
reviews.reviewText: I love this tea pot! But this is the second one that has cracked on me. The first one cracked at the spout, and I had a second one I was going to give as a gift but never did. So I pulled that kettle out and started using it about 4 months ago. This one cracked as well and started leaking out of the bottom. I wish they made this better quality because I love the design and size.
I had my first tea pot for 10 years until my son broke it... I guess I will not let him use my new pot!
Love this kettle. It is very lovely and attractive on my counter. Yes, it is a bit heavy, but the prettiness makes up for that. Been using over 6 months, no problems, holding up nicely.
I totally love my new electric tea pot!! It boils water fast & it looks so nice on my kitchen counter!! Love it!!

reviews.reviewTitle: We use is several times a day. This is ...

The last one lasted a very long time and would have lasted longer if someone hadn't forgotten to put water in it and turned it on. I have also purchased one for my sisters family and they use it every day as well.

Love this product! It is a bit heavy as some others have suggested, but it's beautiful and functional. The only small downside is that the ceramic doesn't keep the water hot for very long, but you just hit the switch again and warm
It back up. Really glad I purchased.

I bought one for work and Im buying a second one to keep at home. I love the automatic shut-off and the lit "on" button that's easy to see in a darker corner. I haven't filled it to its maximum level though--I just don't need more than two cups at a time. I wish there was a smaller model.
This looks so nice on my counter and its so easy i use it daily!

It is a little heavy when filled because it is ceramic but the handle allows for an easy grip and it doesn't bother me at all. So glad I purchased this.

I Absolutely love this product. I have had it for about 6 months. It is as beautiful as it is functional. It heats water to a boil within about 2 minutes. I use it daily.

This is the second Bella product I've bought. I use it constantly for tea, cider and everytime a recipe calls for hot water. I like the beautiful patterns on both last year's Bella and this year's Bella. This year, I gave one to my Mom.

This is really a beautiful kettle. It is quite large, yet somehow does not much water. It is also really heavy. I do not think I would buy this kettle again, but will continue to use it until it gets old or breaks.

reviews.reviewTitle: Progressively slower to boil, don't be fooled by its wonderful looks
reviews.reviewText: Beautiful kettle that I loved using and looking at on the cabinet when I first got it. But over the last month or so, after being in regular use (used 1-2x/day, about 4 days/week, for the last 6 months), the kettle now takes up to 15 minutes to boil water when full. I'm very disappointed and plan to call in on the warranty for the product. This makes me sad, because I like to keep products for a long time, but this kettle just won't cut it.

After only a few weeks of use, we boiled the kettle (not using too much or too little water, etc. - just normal use) and the entire body of the kettle cracked when the water finished boiling.

May be a defective one that we were sent, but this is super dangerous. And because its after the 30 days (by one day) we can't return it.

Do not buy, unless you want a kettle that you only have for a few weeks and puts your family at risk of serious burns.

reviews.reviewTitle: A wonder teapot of infinit bliss!
reviews.reviewText:
The second this little wonder pot arrived in the mail, I gleefully tore the box open and have been using it ever since. The design is adorable, not in a cutesy childish way, rather classically adorable. I was worried it would look too bohemian but the blue and white has a classic look which is perfect for my old fashioned taste.

The pot works exactly as marketed. It has a switch on the back that you flip and wait for the water to boil. Once it boils, it very handily shuts itself off, giving you the peace of mind knowing its safe (won't boil away) and that it will not be powered on 24/7. It heats water fantastically fast. I pour the water in, flip the switch, find my favorite mug and then try to make a decision of which of my teas to pick from (I may or may not have a million of them). By the time I have chosen my tea, the pot is already done and I can the enjoy the infinite bliss only a fresh cup of tea can provide!

I took the pot to the office to share because our water service is gone. My coworkers love the pot so much that they now periodically bring me a gallon of water to contribute so that they can have hot tea/coffee/hot chocolate. That being said, I do recommend using filtered water - where we live the water is naturally "hard" meaning lots of minerals. Those minerals can build up in the pot and cause flaking and debris in the water on subsequent boils.

Allow me to explain why I purchased this pot over any of the others available on Amazon. I spent days researching this, reading product reviews, going to forums and more. I am a little paranoid about heating anything up in plastic due to chemicals leaching into the water. with the Bella I have no such fears! She is made of glass and stainless steel at every portion that will come into contact with water. The Bottom has a stainless steel plate for heat, and a rod of stainless steel that goes up the inside side of the pitcher. because it Is glass and stainless it does have some weight to it. but definitely weighs less than my pressure cooker! it sits on a small base with a center thing that conducts heat into the pot. the disk doesn't get hot on the edges. and the area that surrounds it doesn't get hot allowing for ease of movement and no burns! (for this klutz a major concern).

I am officially a huge fan and will definitely be buying this in future not only for myself but for anyone that could possibly need it!

This teapot has truly changed my life and I don't know how I ever lived without it. I dream of a time where I can Have two of these bad girls (her name is Bella, I Decided she's a girl don't judge) so that I can have one for home. Its a wonderful gadget and absolutely perfect for its function.
Great! Pretty great

reviews.reviewTitle: I love our new tea pot
reviews.reviewText:
I love our new tea pot! Prior to this purchase, we had a glass electric tea kettle; I was always concerned with the fragility. After my husband broke our glass kettle while washing it, the search began for something a little more sturdy and more importantly, not plastic. First of all this teapot is so pretty, I don't mind leaving it out on my counter. Additionally it is much, much quieter than our prior kettle.
As others mentioned it is a little heavy (I was fully aware of this prior to purchase) especially when full, but it feels more durable than our previous tea pot. The cord is way too short (another fact I was aware of prior) but that is remedied easily with a 1ft extension cord. Finally, there's no screen in the spout to prevent hard water deposits from pouring into your tea; not a deal breaker but it's one feature I do miss from my other tea kettle. Overall, I'm extremely satisfied with this purchase.

reviews.reviewTitle: I was so excited to get it and it looked great in my office
reviews.reviewText: This is such a cute electric tea kettle. I was so excited to get it and it looked great in my office. I've only had it less than 3 weeks and started using it less than a week ago. After 3-4 uses, the on/off switch does NOT work. It's a simple switch that you push down to turn on. It will not stay down. I see that a few others have had the same issue. When I was first hand washing the kettle I noticed that the sound of a small metal ball bearing or something was rolling around within the inner base of the kettle (not the hot plate it sits on). Since it worked and was so cute, I ignored this fact and it didn't "roll around" every time I picked it up so I didn't worry about it. Now I wonder if it's related. I may buy another and hope it's not a lemon as well. Right now I'm looking for another brand but it's hard to find a good looking ceramic electric kettle that is this size and has mostly good reviews. Wishing others better luck!

I have another tea kettle made of stainless steel, and I like it a lot, but was wanting to get another as I was sure it would go out one day, seemed like it was taking a little more time to turn off after it boiled, but that maybe just an impression, as I never timed it. It still works, and I am still keeping it. But, I had this gift certificate, and thought I would get a new one, and this was my choice.

It holds enough water to make a few cups of tea, so no complaint there, although the minimum and maximum levels look a little constraining, as the element is inside the kettle, and not in the base like my other kettle which would hold an extra cup or more of water. This unit is quite heavy when full, being ceramic, and the handle is quite a distance way from the body of the kettle, making it feel not only a little awkward to hold, but makes it feel heavier as the filled kettle is further away from your hand. See picture, you can see how far away the kettle it, although this is good in the fact you keep your hand far enough away from the hot kettle, but I think it is a little too far. I deducted a star because of this.

But as far as heating the water, it is great. Heats in a little quicker time than my stainless steel model, which may be because the element is inside the pot (?), but again, I haven't measured the time, it is a perceived time savings. It looks and feels like a sturdy unit, but being a ceramic kettle, I have fears of one day it breaking and spilling hot water everywhere, but that might be unfounded, as if feels solid. If you have weak wrists, this may not be for you, but my wife (she's 71 now) doesn't seem to have problems, and likes the kettle. And she makes tea with it more than I do. I'm just giving some honest views for anyone wanting to buy it.

In short, I do like it, but the weight is an issue, and the slightly less capacity of water due to the internal heating element, but since it is the two of us, we only make 2 cups at a time, so the water capacity is adequate for our needs. If we nave company, at least now we have an additional unit.

I've been using this kettle everyday for about 2 weeks now. I followed the instruction for first time use written in the manual. But the smell of plastic or some chemical was present even after several days of use. It really made the tea taste bad. Also the lid was very difficult to open and I was afraid I would break the handle off from trying to take it off the kettle. After reading some reviews here, I took off the silicone gasket/ring around the lid and also took the plug off the lid. According to the manual, the gasket/ring around the lid regulates the temperature and without it, it may not shut off automatically. So I was a bit worried about this. But the taste of plastic/chemical was just too much that I decided to chance it. Now the water tastes fine and the kettle shuts off automatically. Without the silicone ring on the lid, it is not super tight fitting so when pouring water, be sure not to tip over too far. So I'm very happy with this kettle. It is heavier than typical plastic and stainless ones but I personally like the weight on this kettle.

Love the look but the smell is pretty bad.
Great product!

I love this! It looks nice even you put it on the table to serve teas with it.

I love this kettle. Great quality.

One of the best things we've bought in a long time! Fast, safe, convenient, easy to clean, beautiful.
Very efficient tea kettle!
Beautiful- matches my Kate Spade china set!
Good price

Unfortunately when my friend opened it we discovered the silicon seal around the lid was broken. I returned it and purchased it again. Sadly the second one stopped working after couple weeks. Update: just a week shy of 2 years and this is still working like new!!! I use it heavily at least 3 4 x a day.

Well quick and short Review. Heats up at max level 1.5 to 2 minutes. Is gorgeous and looks amazing in my kitchen. Cons : None every woman needs one of theses!

Bought it in November of 2015, and have been using it twice a day. It just totally broke today... First, the light when on started to malfunction and then it just died... So the life span was almost 3 years with moderate use. Disappointing.

reviews.reviewTitle: Nice pot, but was to heavy for the wife ...
reviews.reviewText: Nice pot,but was to heavy for the wife to handle.
It is perfect for my office!!!
thx! My sister loved it
Works great! Nice design, we are hoping the kettle gets less build up, we have had no such luck with our plastic one.

Aesthetically it is a beautiful tea kettle, however functionally I'm very disappointed. Once it boils it is very hot and can burn if you touch it. It takes longer than average to boil. Lastly, it has no temperature control so you don't know what temperature the water is. Will be returning it.
Very nice so far....
Love, Love, Love it.

The teapot looks great, but it broke within two months of very light usage. The button on the side to turn it on just stopped working. It will no longer turn to the on position. Pretty disappointed with this product.

reviews.reviewTitle: I use it many times a day. Do have ...
reviews.reviewText: I use it many times a day. Do have to make sure hard water deposits don't build up on the bottom, but that's hardly the kettle's fault.

Unfortunately the plastic ring around the top lid broke after only a few uses. We were unable to return the kettle as we where two days outside of the return window. We are disappointed in the quality of this kettle.

I was looking for an alternative to plastic electric kettles, and I found this ceramic one more aesthetic than steel ones. I have had it for two weeks, and it works just fine up till now. It is probably not the most practical choice though. The lid is not that convenient to take off - I often fear to break the loop handle when doing so. And being ceramic of course there is a greater chance of braking it. So, just as often, there is aesthetics vs. practicality trade-off here :-).
Love the pot because it goes well w my French Provincial kitchen! Of course it works well, too!

I love this little kettle so much. Not only does it work leaps and bounds better than any electric kettle I've had before, but it's so much cuter in the process.
Other kettles I've had never really get the water to boiling. This kettle is perfect for a cup of tea
Works great! Fits our needs!
This is a very beautiful tea kettle. I purchased it as a gift, and it was a big hit.
Love my new teapot! Looks very elegant and different! Works well! A little bit heavy but I like it too!

I love this teapot so so so much. It's very quick to boil water, and well, it's so beautiful.
Such high quality. I would buy it over and over again.
Great!
This tea kettle adds the right amount of style with its amazing functionality for my start up business to look its best.
Love the electric kettle. Highly recommended.
Absolutely horrible... The whole unit gets extremely hot and does not trap any steam... The blue led light is very tacky...
I have only had this since July 7 and it has already quit working !!!! I'm not very happy !!!
smells a lot!

I needed an electric kettle to replace my old one, which was getting a bit gross-looking. This Bella kettle, which I got in Copper Chrome, is absolutely beautiful. I love the color! I think it looks much fancier than it is. It's very eye-catching on my kitchen counter.

I actually think it boils water about twice as fast as my old kettle, which was a nice surprise. Another reviewer mentioned that it was slow to boil, but that hasn't been my experience with it so far. For me, it only takes a few minutes. If it starts lagging in a few months, I will update this review.

All in all, I like this much, much better than my old electric kettle. It's convenient, fast and sleek... what more could you ask for? I am always consistently happy with the Bella products that I've tried.

Lots to like about this Bella 1.5 Liter Electric Ceramic Tea Kettle, and it's almost like, "Where do I start?"

First off, it's replacing a plastic version. My naturopath says not to heat things in plastic, and that includes water. I've been using a plastic version on my wet bar and now that's gone.

Not that it matters, but the black in the floral pattern is complementary to the other appliances on the bar.

Likes:
+ Silicone seal around the lid. Yay - no plastic.
+ Swivel base. Unlike my previous model which had to go on its base only one way, this kettle fits on the base from any direction.
+ Unit turns off when water reaches a boil (previous unit did this, too), and it also turns off if the unit is dry.
+ Heating element is stainless steel.

Dislikes:
- No sight glass. I can't tell how much water is in the kettle unless I open the lid.

That's a bummer for me, but really, it's my only complaint. Everything else about this kettle is really nice. Hi quality, attractive, and it does exactly what it's designed to do.

This kettle is marvelous. The lid comes completely off, and it has a rubber seal that keeps it tight so it doesn't fall off when pouring. There are several heat levels and the boiling level takes about 4 minutes to boil 1.7 liters of water. That is faster than my microwave.

The instructions aren't that clear, but you have to push the on button, then push the heat level you desire, then either while the water is heating or even after it is hot, you push the keep warm button and it stays hot for 2 hours! AND what I really like is that you can remove the kettle, pour your water, and put it back on the element and you haven't lost your program. It still keeps your water warm at the temperature you first selected!

The color is beautiful, but it isn't white and blue. It is more like a soft cream white--whiter than cream color, but not much.

Looks great on my countertop. Fits perfectly under the cabinet and can remove/replace the kettle easily.

The only thing that is not quite loveable is that the instructions say to put the element on a trivet or put something between it and the vinyl countertop or it might discolor/darken it. So I have it sitting on the two trivets my granddaughter made me. Was wondering how to use them :D

reviews.reviewTitle: A BPA-Free Electric Kettle to Admire!
reviews.reviewText:
Making water hot is not terribly exciting - nor does it matter much if it takes a few seconds longer. Nevertheless - this kettle is a real beauty (and yes, it makes water boil quicker than the one it had replaced in my kitchen), and there are two things it does to justify paying a little extra.

First - it claims (and appears) to be BPA-free. BPA is common in plastic products and could dissolve into water. There is a recent growing awareness regarding BPA as a health concern, so having a new BPA-free electric kettle is a good way to eliminate another potential source of it. Second - It is such a beauty! The near-transparent glass-type material lets one see the water boiling, which is a sight enhanced by the LED lights and color.

This is not a purely functional tea kettle in terms and look (as represented in its pricing) - but rest assured it also functions very well! I also like the automatic shut-off feature and the swivel base the kettle rests on. This product is a little more expensive than other brands, but I think it is worth the price. Five stars!

reviews.reviewTitle: Looks nice, boils fast and offers you temp choices and warming option. No danger leaving it on.
reviews.reviewText: I’ve had a couple of these kettles but I’ve never had a ceramic one. The first thing I notice is it’s much better looking than my other ones but the second thing I notice is it’s way heavier than my metal ones that I have had before it. But I like the look so much that I think it’s worth it. I’ve only been using it a couple days and I really like it so far. It’s definitely fast and if you haven’t tried an electric kettle you dont know what your missing. Fast and easy to use and safe because you dont have to worry about leaving it on, it will shut off automatically. This feature is great for anyone especially seniors who forget things like that. But if you get one for a senior I would recommend a lighter one than this. One other thing that’s different from other ones is that you cannot see the water level from the outside.

My wife is super particular about what sits on her counter. Fortunately, this one gets to stay.
Heavy and modern, this ceramic water heater heats quite quickly and easier than in a microwave. The sensors on the control panel allow you to select a particular type of tea (black, oolong, etc.) and the water heats to the recommended temperature. If you want just boiling water and to keep it at that temperature, one touch will do that.

The pot is well made and the top fits securely to avoid an accidental spilling. I’ve never really appreciated the need for a pot like this, it it has now become a great boon in the kitchen. It would make for a great gift since it fits with any decor, doesn’t take up space, and functions as advertised.

This marble kettle looks very sophisticated on the kitchen counter or use it in your own B&B. No worries about fires, it has an auto shut off that doesn’t allow it to boil dry. Much safer than stove top and quicker and more efficient than the microwave. Easy to clean with the detachable swivel base. Boil water efficiently for tea, oatmeal etc. I like to have a pot on hand to warm up my coffee or tea. Fairly durable. Good quality 1350 wattage and easy to store. Also great for camping in the RV. I only carry instant coffee while camping so this is perfect.

Absolutely love it! Took me 3 weeks to pick one out, my last kettle I purchased at a thrift store sans whistle and the insides were being torn apart due to forgetting it on the stove so it was deffinitely time for a new machine. We have a lovely little electric kettle at work that we use fairly often throughout the day and I loved the speed and ease of it so I knew electric was the way I was wanting to go. After looking through many many models on many different sites and in stores I came back and decided to take the plunge on this one.

I purchased it in "Like New" condition, there were a couple of seeming water spots on the inside but not another hair was out of place. After having it now for give or take a week or two I am a complete fan!

It can be heavy for those with "softer" wrists, especially when it actually has water in it, but for a regular person it's nothing. I want to say it weighs 3 pounds empty. It's very quiet as well! Of course, when it reaches it's boiling point there is some sound but nothing overwhelming and it falls to an immediate decline.

There is no whistle, no timer, no fancy buttons - just one on/off switch (that has automatic shut off) that lights up blue when in use. It has a safe boil heating element so you don't have to worry about dribbles.

Now, because it is ceramic it definitely does get hot, but the handle is just the right size and shape to keep you safe from coming in contact with the body - the neck can be warm but manageable, thankfully the bottom (which is plastic seeming) stays completely cool even after several back-to-back uses and you should feel safe touching the bottom to use as leverage - or at least this was so in my case.

The lid is on there tight and good, but be gentle when removing it. I'm noticing I'm trying to yank it off then having to stop myself before the big yank in fear of not watching my hands and breaking the little ceramic lid on the counter/table/dog whatever may hit it - I'm trying to learn to twist it off gently now and that seems to be much more productive then yanking without a care.

All in all I would highly recommend and will be coming back to buy a few more as gifts for friends and family! Maybe even at full price next time lol

This is my first electric tea kettle ever. I typically use the ones that warm up water on a stove, but then again, if you are drinking tea. all water needs to be used up while it is still hot. And even with insulated pots, the water does not stay warm over the prolonged period of time. With electric pot, it is easy to keep water warmed up over prolonged period of time.

This pot also looks nice, so when on the counter, it looks presentable. Base is detachable and one can use tea kettle by itself so in that sense, it is multi purpose. I was particularly attracted to this pot because it measures the amount of water in liters (metric system).

One of the reasons I chose this was the design. Black roses on a ceramic white tea kettle just seemed so appropriate. This boils water surprisingly fast. I've been using it for close to a month and almost every day and have no complaints so far. it's an inexpensive kettle, but it gets the job done, and it does it quickly.

I've always relied on the microwave, or a kettle on the stove, which is pretty slow, so this was a nice surprise.

reviews.reviewTitle: Does What it's Made for, and Looks Great
reviews.reviewText:
I have worked for an importer of Chinese tea. I've co-written three books on Chinese green tea. https://www.amazon.com/World-Famous-Chinese-Green-Teas-Dragonwell/dp/0982654022/ref=sr_1_10?ie=UTF8&qid=1543604362&sr=8-10&keywords=4+world-famous+chinese+green+tea
So I am always curious about tea kettles. For me, this kettle does what it should do, boil water. It does it as well as any other kettle I have used, and it is darned good looking. It boils water within an acceptable time frame. It has auto shutoff, it shuts off if it boils dry, and there is a power light. If your purpose is to boil water to make tea, this is a great option. Highly recommended.

My daughter has this in her dorm room and loves it. It heats up very quickly and holds a lot (1.5 liter). The ceramic material is a nice touch, giving it a more legitimate home feel, and keeping things warm. She likes that it has a plastic bottom to protect the ceramic from countertops too. It’s easy to clean, and a great addition. We expect it to last, but if it disappoints I’ll update this review.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5 Years On and Still Loving It!
reviews.reviewText:
I received this kettle as a gift (not bought on Amazon) 5 and a half years ago. It survived heavy use throughout college, has been banged on cement walls and dropped, and yet it still works perfectly! I love it so much that I took it across the country with me when I moved!
The only warnings I'll give is that if you consistently fill it up past the max line (which is clearly marked on the inside), it might start to spill at the bottom because water has built up there. I realized that after I'd been overfilling it for months, stopped overfilling it, and the problem stopped.
After heavy use for five years, it had developed hard water stains on the bottom, but I poured in some vinegar and let it sit for a day and the stains disappeared.
I highly recommend this kettle!

reviews.reviewTitle: Rubbish can't use it the wiring is not for uk ...
reviews.reviewText:
Rubbish can't use it the wiring is not for uk can't send it back it will cost more than it cost in the first place my advice is
Don't buy from USA

Let me first start by saying that this is a great kettle. With all of the fantastic reviews and little report of what happened to us initially, I am going with the notion that we just got a one off. The first unit that was sent to us would not work in our kitchen with the GFCI circuit system. It would pop our reset button every time. After trying other appliances with heating elements I determined that it was the unit at fault. Amazon shipped our replacement immediately and it was here the next day. The new kettle is fantastic and boils water at an outstandingly fast pace. It looks great on the counter and comes recommended by our friends across the pond. I totally recommend you go ahead with this purchase, and disregard the possibility of having one wired incorrectly. Of course this would be five stars, and is as far as the new unit is concerned, but as an honest reviewer I must subtract for our initial issues.

reviews.reviewTitle: Beautiful, practical - great gift for tea lovers
reviews.reviewText: We LOVE the Bella ceramic electric tea kettle. The black and white design is very eye catching and blends in any kitchen. Putting it together was simple. The kettle goes on the base, put on the lid and you are ready after plugging it in! You must fill up the kettle over the minimum line but not above the maximum line. It's takes about a minute to heat and the off switch turns off automatically, so no worrying you left it on. We've wanted an electric kettle for awhile and this is perfect.

My MIL has had this kettle forever and I’ve had so many steel kettles rust, I finally went for ceramic and got this one. It’s working great. I haven’t had any puddles or cracks. It is heavy, but I just fill it with a filtered water pitcher so I’m not moving I around often. No issues with the rubber sealing thing at the top. It also boils way faster than any of the many electronic and old school kettles I’ve had. Im glad I knew it was reliable from my MIL, otherwise I probably wouldn’t have gotten it based on these reviews. Anyways, that’s my 2 cents.

Our house guest just dropped a heavy pitcher onto our Bella kettle that we've had for over a year. It broke the spout AND took a whole lot of paint off the cooktop. Well, I ordered a whole new Bella kettle immediately (though I kept the undamaged old base and lid just in case). When my husband came home and I told him what happened to the kettle, he said, "But that was absolutely the perfect kettle for us." It was. It matched our beautiful kitchen white and Mexican tile walls; it was good and heavy and expensive looking, it heats faster than anything else, it stays pristinely clean (no "fur" as the English call the residue that builds inside a kettle used only for water boiling), and it is big, like a coffee pot. We love it. It has become a necessity.

I’m really enjoying this Bella brand glass kettle. Heating is a snap. Automatic shut off actually works. The water window, allowing you to view how much is in the kettle, is very useful. The kettle is small and does not take up a lot of counter space. No complaints about, or failures or defects found in, this kettle after multiple uses. Moreover, it’s stylish design looks good in my kitchen and is a definite bonus.

I LOVE LOVE LOVE This kettle. It's very sturdy ceramic and heavier than I expected it to be, but in a good way. You fill it with water (between the Min and Max fill lines) and then place it on the base. You flip the switch and it turns itself off after it's warmed the water. It heats the water evenly and works great. It's very easy to clean. Overall, I use it multiple times a day and I love it!

reviews.reviewTitle: So far it's been working well.
reviews.reviewText: This has been a great alternative to constantly getting my hot water from my tea from my Keurig, and much much better than wearing out my microwave boiling water that way. It heats water quickly and the kettle has a nice weight to it. I do prefer it have a little weight to is so it's not as tippy. I'd rather it be heavier than have it feel cheap and plasticky. It's been working well!

Buyer beware, if you care about filling landfills. This company does not offer a way for you to purchase parts. Here's a photo of the lid that broke from regular use which started out with a tiny chip. I sent them an email about the broken lid and it took them 3 weeks to respond requiring for proof of purchase, name, address, etc., provided them with all the details and took another 2 days to respond only to notify you that they cannot do anything to help you. WHAT A WASTE as the pot itself is still useful; however, it's just not safe without the lid as boiling water will burn your hand.

If only this form allows for 0 stars or a thumbs down, I would have chosen that.

Yes, it's pretty and looks good in my kitchen. Interior is all ceramic. Lighted power switch is useful. However, it's HEAVY when empty and VERY HEAVY when full of water. As water boils, the exterior gets hot. If I use one hand to lift and one hand to support the kettle, a pot holder is required to protect my supporting hand. I received the Bella tea kettle as a gift from my spouse, who likes it a lot. I'm 55 years old with moderate arthritis in my hands, so the Bella kettle is probably not a good choice for anyone with arthritis or a weak grip.

reviews.reviewTitle: Beautiful kettle. Takes longer to boil.
reviews.reviewText: This is absolutely a gorgeous ceramic kettle. It does have some weight to it. I would recommend not to place more water than stated, meaning do no go above or on the MAX sign. I wished it was bigger than the 1.5 liter capacity, personally. And I do feel that it takes longer to boil up. Maybe it is because it is only 1350 watts - possibly 1500 would have been better.

I bought this kettle about 5 years ago at Macy's. I use it every single day and it's wonderful. We do live in n area with extremely hard water and there is scale buildup on the bottom, but I use LemmeShine to clean that right up. The lid I pop in the dishwasher and the whole thing is clean! Bella came out with a great product and I'm so glad I purchased it. I know I'll be using it for years to come and will most likely buy one for my mom too. (Oh I have the black floral one. It was that or plain back then. It works out because it's a pretty black hydrangea)

Can't remember if I got this from Amazon or Walmart. This lasted less than 2 years. It now pours water out the bottom. I took it apart and found the issue with the tube that comes up from the bottom. It's leaking from that thing. No fixing this POS. I hate to buy something and throw it out less then 2 years later. I'd pay twice as much for something guaranteed to last a long time. If asked, I would say don't buy this. Try your luck somewhere else.

Great Kettle. Has options for temperature for different beverages or hot water needed for foods. Pretty. Sturdy. Easy to Clean. Only complaint is the cord is short, it has to be very close to an outlet or needs an extension cord.

Push button controls for different settings, easy to use. Recommended !

I like the kettle itself, but the lid breaks easily. Without the lid, the kettle won't shut off. The company used to sell replacement lids, I went through several, but they don't do it anymore, and this is a deal breaker for me.

This is really lovely and well made and seems to work quite well. Only down side (and this may be because I am used to a metal one and not used to ceramic) is that it is very heavy to lift with one hand when full. It was a gift for someone who may not be ale to lift it easily for many more years so I was disappointed when I realized how heavy it was.

I just found that I had inadvertently left it on without water in it *for over two hours*. The thing was hot and smelled. Fire hazard. I hope it is just my unit and not the case for all units!

Edit: I called customer service. They confirmed this is abnormal and will give me a refund.

I tested also it again without water and this time it did an auto shut off. So I conclude the auto shut off mechanism in my unit is unreliable.

I bought this tea kettle as a gift for an elderly aunt. It didn't last a year and when I contacted Amazon and then Bella for a replacement, I received no help. Amazon pushed me to Bella. Bella would not respond to my emails to customer service and after ONE HOUR on hold via telephone for a customer service representative I hung up. My advice - find another brand. Product isn't trustworthy and customer service is awful.

We really like this kettle. The glass part is neat. It is colored copper but you can still see threw it. It looks nice on the table. The quality is nice. The auto shut off works well. This would make a great gift.
I recommend this kettle.

reviews.reviewTitle: I found this to be beautiful. My concerns are its surprisingly huvy
reviews.reviewText: I don't know how I should have rated this cuz I'm not going to be the one using it. I found this to be beautiful. My concerns are its surprisingly huvy. And large. I have a medal one same size not as pretty but so much more practical for everyday use. Lack of packaging was disappointing. Package came dented, wet, and not gift worthy.
This tea kettle heats up much faster then my stove top and it looks very nice. The marble design is very stylish and looks great displayed on my countertop when it’s not being used.

I bought this kettle because it looked great, and I was pleased it looked as nice when it arrived as it did on the pictures. However, after about 2-3 weeks of using the kettle, it cracked half way through horizontally right where the bottom handle is attached. This is after a very mild use - about once a day. It started leaking water, created a mineral sediment around which made even the water taste funny. So I would stay clear from this product, not worth the money!

reviews.reviewTitle: Decent product. No instructions or warranty was in box
reviews.reviewText: Got this as a present for my Mother. Looks nice and works well. Good thing I am with her. No instructions or warranty card in the box. Had to find the manual online.
This kettle is pretty and it works really quickly. The ceramic pot is fantastic. It lifts off the base. I’m really happy with this kettle. And it is pretty enough to leave it out on the counter.

reviews.reviewTitle: Best purchase I made in a while
reviews.reviewText: Let me first say that as a reviewer I do not sugar-coat anything. This tea kettle has been my favorite purchase of all 2018. Other than my car of course. I like that it's made of ceramic or glass which is safer for us to use considering all the Environmental things that we have to worry about these days. I had an metal tea kettle that ended up rusting inside. This tea kettle is quick and convenient and I feel safe using it.
This tea kettle has boil dry protection and a detachable base. The kettle is ceramic and is also attractive. Much prettier than the clear glass kettles.

I really wanted to like this kettle but there was an AWFUL sulfur or rotten egg smell coming from this thing. I think it may of been coming from the electronics on the outside, but it was hard to tell, and the inside smelled like chemicals and plastic. I have never ever smelled such a thing on any electric kettle before.
It looks great, but I just don't trust the weird smells on this thing and certainly don't want that anywhere near my drinking water!

Sorry, I should have listened to the others, got it last than 3 months, now the lid just broke, didn't even drop it, just touching the counter a bit, and the ring part of the lid broke, so disappointed, and do not know where to order the replacement like the others do. Btw, I did not buy this from Amazon- since the ceramics was delicate, so I ordered somewhere else and picked it up in person.

Everybody needs an electric kettle. This one works great and is priced well. The
color scheme is tasteful It works!Heats water fast.

I love my tea kettle! It heats up within 5 minutes. I use it for boiling water for tea or anything I need I need to cook. It beautiful and sturdy, but not too heavy. The automatic shut off feature is really nice too.

reviews.reviewTitle: DO NOT BUY. READ THIS FIRST
reviews.reviewText:
Junk.
Leave it alone. The on/off switch is a low grade plastic that melts and reforms after time, to a point that it will no longer engage the function of heating your water. At this point your kettle is as good as their customer service. Good luck reaching them by phone or email.
As I stated above.
JUNK!!
My wife got this, does a great job heating water, looks great, functions great. Would recommend.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great reliable kettle that keeps clean, heats quick, and looks nice.
reviews.reviewText: Great Kettle. We've had it quite a few years and it's awesome. It works reliably (every day, multiple times a day) and never ever rusts or gets nasty. Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewTitle: Poor customer support for a beautiful piece of garbage
reviews.reviewText: Initially impressed with the quality of the ceramic pot, but on/off switch began malfunctioning within three weeks of light use. I had to unplug the kettle, which sparked every time, to shut off the heat source. The sender refused a request for a refund or replacement. Very disappointing. Beautiful product that ended up in the trash.

I had this pleasant kettle for about 3 years - average use of once/day. It worked perfectly. And then one morning I turned it on - and nothing happened. No cheerful blue glow from the switch; no immanent coffee-glow for me. However, I liked this pot enough that I'm half-tempted to buy the same model again. Insanity? Or a satisfied customer who recognizes most consumer electronics have a limited lifespan?

reviews.reviewTitle: Used daily for 10 months until it quit working
reviews.reviewText: Got this last July for my birthday and use it at lest once every day. I absolutely loved it until it decided to stop working last week. I used it for tea the night before and tried to turn it on the morning and got nothing. It's still under warranty so I am trying to reach them to replace it. Will update this review if that happens.

Completely floored that people are having a problem with this kettle. I've had it for months now, and I can't imagine life without it. First off, it's absolutely beautiful! It's entirely ceramic except for the bottom, which is metal, and the plastic groves to hold the lid down. I've never had a problem with a strange taste or smell. Although, I do recommend cleaning it every once and a while. As a college student, I use the kettle at least twice a day. It's great to boil water fast for pasta or for tea. Looking to get one for my parent's house too! Absolutely love this product!

We have had two now and the plastic seal broke on both lids - which compromises the heating function and the lid falls off when your pour after the seal breaks off. Would be great if they could fix this part or offer replacement lids...

reviews.reviewTitle: ... this teapot for over a year & I absolutely love it!
reviews.reviewText: I have had this teapot for over a year & I absolutely love it!! I purchased this one as a gift for my SIL. I use it multiple times a day. It is worth every penny!

I love my electric tea kettle!! I have used this almost every day since I bought it back in July. Really easy to use, heats water fast, super cute design, and easy to clean. What more could you ask for?!
Looks great and heats water very fast
It broke after 6 months. Unable to boil the water,
Beautiful! It was a Christmas present for my mother in law, so I am unsure how well it works. I do know however that the picture is accurate to the product.

I have had our kettle for a couple of years now and although it is heavy I a quite pleased with it - Except now the gasket in the lid falls off and I cannot seem to find where I can get a replacement - Any ideas - anyone?
Beautiful and durable. Works great. So pretty, I leave mine out as decor on my countertop.

Heavier than I expected, but heats up super fast and looks great! And the water stays warm for a long time with it being ceramic. Just maybe not for someone with weak wrist strength as it's quite heavy when full.
This is my 2nd kettle from this company. I love it! I’ve event sent as house warming gifts.

reviews.reviewTitle: I really like the look of this tea kettle and it works ...
reviews.reviewText: I really like the look of this tea kettle and it works wonderfully! Unfortunately ceramic lid broke soon after purchase and has been on back order. I am on a waiting list, which suggests s design defect.
This kettle broke on first use. Such a shame since its so aesthetically pleasing but the kid just snapped & couldn't be opened. The porcelain is very brittle.

reviews.reviewTitle: This works good and looks awesome
reviews.reviewText: This works good and looks awesome. But it is extremely heavy and not easy to open the lid, there is a sealing rubber inside the lid. Not sure how long this sealing rubber will last...
Very cute and perfect for leaving out on the counter

reviews.reviewTitle: Looks and works great, but is fragile!
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely loved this Kettle...but we've had it less than a year and when the spout hit against the backsplash after being accidentally bumped, it broke off. =( We're really sad and now we'll probably be getting a stainless steel replacement so we don't have to worry about it breaking if it gets bumped.

reviews.reviewTitle: This is good for French Press because it has a spout that ...
reviews.reviewText: High quality. Not too big for galley kitchen. Cover fits tightly. This is good for French Press because it has a spout that is a precise pour. Also, surprised that it does not make much steam so it can go under cabinets.
THE CUSTOMER SERVICE IS HORRIBLE . The tea kettle broke after 4 month of use and company gave really hard time with refund. Would not recommend this product ever!
Its beautiful
Feels really expensive when you touch it. Great quality. I'm happy, thanks!

its too heavy....cant see water level...used for one month, started leaking from bottom of spout. called BELLA, terrible CS..told me they dont have that complaint listed so just go back to store and return it! just what I did...never buying bella products again!
I ordered this as a Christmas gift in December and the handle broke in May.

reviews.reviewTitle: Loved mine so much I ordered a second one for ...
reviews.reviewText:
Loved mine so much I ordered a second one for my sister.
Just wanted to let you know it was delivered in the wrong address,the person was nice to bring it to my home.
I have had the Bella kettle about three years. Love it. Heats quickly and stays clean. Pretty too. Sisters and nieces had admired mine and each have one now too.
Beautiful. Heated fairly quickly. You can take it off the base and put it on a table for serving. Loved it until it decided to stop working after about 4 months of use.
I wanted a gift package but it came in the normal way I wrote a note, but it wasn't
pretty, works well, heats quick, love it.

Love the kettle, been waiting for ages to finally get one. Carried it back from the US to Germany, plugged it in (with an adaptor, of course), it boiled water once, then combusted, ruining my multi-country adapter in the process. I now have a broken $50 kettle and a broken $20 adapter. Ugh.

reviews.reviewTitle: water is leaking after used for 4 month
reviews.reviewText: I used it for 4 month and water is leaking from the bottom to top joining section.
Absolutely LOVE this and how easy it is to use. Was given as a gift and it has been perfect.
After less than a dozen uses, the heating element doesn't turn on (and the switch doesn't light up) when I depress the switch. It's beautiful but useless.

We bought this electric kettle about 4 months ago and we couldn't be happier. After living in Europe for two years, we got used to the speed and convenience of electric kettles but we never liked how they looked (black plastic and metal). When we saw this ceramic electric kettle we couldn't resist trying it out. It is wonderful! It boils water quickly (couple of minutes) and it has an all-ceramic and metal interior (no plastic). It has a good weight but is not too heavy, and the lid snaps on so you don't have to worry about it coming off while pouring. We highly recommend this product for anyone who wants a stylish kettle that boils quickly with no hassle.

reviews.reviewTitle: Stopped working in less than 6 months
reviews.reviewText:
I received this as a Christmas gift without a receipt. Two weeks ago, it stopped heating to the boiling point. When I contacted the company, they informed me that there is no replacement part available and/or no replacement of the entire item because I do not have a receipt.

My average use in 6 months was once a week. I thought it would last longer than that; and I thought the manufacturer would be more concerned about the reliability of their product. I was thinking maybe they would want to have the kettle back to determine what caused the problem. It is a beautiful kettle and looks great sitting in my dining room;; however I can heat the water to a hotter degree in my microwave.

reviews.reviewTitle: My kiddos - High School age love this tea pot
reviews.reviewText:
My kiddos - High School age love this tea pot. We use it 5-8 times a day for tea, water for oatmeal, noodle cups ect.
This would be a great gift for a college kiddo.

reviews.reviewTitle: Uhhhhh, is everyone sure you're supposed to leave the ...
reviews.reviewText: Uhhhhh, is everyone sure you're supposed to leave the plastic around the top on? My instinct was that it is packaging. I don't have that chemical odor at all without it.....

reviews.reviewTitle: It looks nice and appears to be good quality
reviews.reviewText: It looks nice and appears to be good quality. However, the tip broke off with normal use in about a week. Terrible!!!! Don't buy, stick with stainless steel.
very pretty, but only worked the first time.

reviews.reviewTitle: Bella Electric Kettle is a must!!!
reviews.reviewText: Love it, bought 2 more for Birthday presents, they love it!! Water nice and hot. Now you never need to worry about leaving your burner on anymore!!!

reviews.reviewTitle: Maybe it only happens to me: this kettle keeps ...
reviews.reviewText: Maybe it only happens to me: this kettle keeps tripping the breaker when I press the clicker. My old kettle does not trip. I am send it back.

reviews.reviewTitle: Would not recommend or buy again
reviews.reviewText: The plastic ring in the lid broke within one year, and there are blue pieces of something coming from the connecting piece in the bottom of the kettle.
Gave is a Christmas gift to my daughter, stop working in less than 5 months.

reviews.reviewTitle: ... for my granddaughter and a friend was visiting and liked it so much she purchased one too
reviews.reviewText: I get more comments on it I bought one for my granddaughter and a friend was visiting and liked it so much she purchased one too. It's not only attractive it heats up fast

This a beautiful tea kettle, but the bottom inside started to rust after 3 months of use, very poor quality. It would be nice if they used quality materials inside like stainless steel. It doesn't feel good to drink tea with rust!
I love my kettle . Does anyone know where to get a replacement lid for it?
Such a beautiful and well made kettle. I am now considering two more of them for Christmas gifts.
very good product....

reviews.reviewTitle: it was leaking like a sieve
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this as a Christmas gift for my daughter. Within a few months, after only using it a few times, it was leaking like a sieve. The company would not refund or replace it as it was after Jan. 31st.

I bought this mainly because it looks really nice (and it does) but the quality is poor at best. After less than six months of use (bought it 10/29/2016) the kettle has already come apart twice. Had to tape and glue the handle and the lid broke the other day. This is from normal use only, we haven't dropped it or anything like that. Overall it works as intended (4 stars) and it looks really nice (5 stars) but the overall quality and durability is very poor (1 star). When I buy something I plan on it lasting longer than 6 months. Overall 2 stars, would not buy this again.

reviews.reviewTitle: Manufacturer defect on otherwise cute pot
reviews.reviewText:
I was able to use this kettle for about a year before I started to notice a leak from directly below the spout in the body of the kettle. I am not the only customer to experience this, I realized after reading the lower rated reviews. I have contacted customer service regarding the 2 year warranty but have not heard back in two weeks so take that as you will.

The kettle is very cute on the counter. It's not that quiet when heating up water (and seemed to get louder the longer I owned it). The sides get very hot as it's 100% ceramic and there is no insulation. It's also very heavy when full of water and after about a year the switch to turn it on and off started acting up. Overall, I really enjoyed this product (if not the product support) and would recommend it to someone who requires a water kettle for light use. The build quality and weight make me hesitant to recommend it to someone who wants to use it very frequently.

reviews.reviewTitle: Perfect mix of style and convenience!
reviews.reviewText: Finally writing a review after using this DAILY for nearly 4 months! After reading countless reviews for countless electric kettles I took the plunge and waged my bets on this kettle being the best fit for us. We have a coffee bar off the kitchen and previously exclusively used a Keurig. I was dying to switch to a better brew but knew that if we went the "pour over" route that I would have to get an electric kettle or our coffee bar would be rendered useless. This particular kettle really appealed to me because I knew it would be out for everyone to see, all the time. The negative reviews really held me back from purchasing at first but ultimately I'm really glad we took the chance. Heed the warnings - this is heavy! I knew this upon ordering and knew that some had experienced the ceramic cracking near the handle (perhaps due to fatigue) so I'm mindful of my pour. I always use a towel and support the spout with my left hand while pouring - this helps combat the weight issue while also controlling my pour. It consistently takes 7 minutes to heat a "max fill" pot. The lid is secure and easy to remove. I wouldn't change a thing about it - even knowing it's heavy, which makes me feel like it is likely a little more strong and will resist a crack when accidentally knocked against the sink wall. I would definitely recommend this kettle to anyone who does not have trouble lifting something a little heavy with one hand.

This has become one of my most used appliances! It brings water to a boil in half the time it takes in the microwave, let alone the stove. Not only does this save time when making tea (which I use it for multiple times a day,) but I also use it to bring water to a boil to save time when cooking things such as pasta or steamed vegetables. (Pour the boiling water into the preheated cooking pot/pan, don't attempt to cook in this kettle!)

I also sometimes take it out of the kitchen so I can have a second/third/seventh cup of tea while working in my home office or watching tv.

This kettle is pretty- it looks good on your counter, and nice enough to use for serving guests in a more formal setting. I got the silver tile color, and the silver design is actually metallic, not a flat grey. I hosted a tea party themed shower with pots of loose leaf tea. I was able to quickly and conveniently heat water to fill and refill the teapots because of this kettle, and got many compliments on it.

The kettle is incredibly easy to use and maintain. I follow the manual's cleaning and care instructions, and mine is still working and looking like new, despite heavy use and hard water. I love the safety automatic off switch.

Another feature I love is that the cord can be wound up and stored under the base.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great machine, But it broke after 2 months
reviews.reviewText:
Everything is good about this product, except that it stopped working after two months. I get that it could be a defect, however two months for a defect to show up is weird.
I like the temperature control, and I also like how easy it is to use. My complaints are:
1. The lid on top is design very poorly compared to the previous models I owned, it doesn’t open up easily and it’s dangerous when it’s hot as the ceramic gets hot and your hand also gets exposed to steam.
2. The pot is super heavy, I get that it’s ceramic, But surely there should be a way to reduce the weight.
An Amazon complaint:

If customer service is key, then Amazon should replace the item on the spot especially when They have a support line for this product, and send the defective item back to manufacturer themselves, rather than the customer reaching out to the manufacturer and wasting more time and not having the product to use.

PROS:
-It's stylish. I have not had a visitor who hasn't commented on how great it looks.
-It boils, quick.
